summary: The move would bring the chip maker into the same market with such companies at Bitmain and MicroBT.
title: Intel to Unveil 'Ultra Low-Voltage Bitcoin Mining ASIC' in February
content: Intel, one of the world's largest chip makers, is likely to unveil a specialized crypto-mining chip at the International Solid-State Circuits Conference (ISSCC) in February, according to the conference's agenda.
Read more: Bitmain Adds Liquid Cooling Technology to Its Latest Bitcoin Mining Rigs
